Acknowledge Selected Alarms and Events Dialog Box

Requires: NI Distributed System Manager

In the Alarms and Events view, click the Acknowledge button to display this dialog box. You also can press the <Ctrl> key to select, then acknowledge multiple alarms and events.

Use this dialog box to acknowledge individual alarms and events.

Note  Use the Acknowledge All Alarms and Events dialog box to acknowledge all the alarms and events in the Alarms and Events view at once.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Comments—Use this text box to enter a comment when you acknowledge alarms.
    Note  Comments apply to alarms only. You must have the LabVIEW Datalogging and Supervisory Control (DSC) Module installed to enter a comment.
  • OK—Acknowledges all the alarms and events and closes this dialog box. When you acknowledge events, the NI Distributed System Manager removes the events from the Alarms and Events view.
  • Cancel—Cancels the acknowledging and closes this dialog box.
